00098     public PrintPanel(JDialog creator, Project project, boolean printDirectly) {
00099         if (project == null) {
00100             throw new NullPointerException();
00101         }
00102         this.creator = creator;
00103         this.project = project;
00104 
00105         $$$setupUI$$$();
00106 
00107         /* Project Information */
00108         header.setText(project.getName() + " (" + project.getType() + " Project)");
00109         header.setFont(header.getFont().deriveFont(Font.BOLD));
00110         operator.setText(project.getProperty(Project.OPERATOR_PROPERTY, "") + " / " +
00111                 project.getProperty(Project.DATE_PROPERTY, DateFormat.getDateInstance().format(new Date())));
00112         latitude.setText(project.getProperty(Project.LATITUDE_PROPERTY, ""));
00113         longitude.setText(project.getProperty(Project.LONGITUDE_PROPERTY, ""));
00114         strike.setText("" + project.getStrike());
00115         dip.setText("" + project.getDip());
00116         mass.setText("" + project.getMass());
00117         volume.setText("" + project.getVolume());
00118         susceptibility.setText("" + project.getSusceptibility());
00119 
00120         /* calculate Density and Q (what ever it is, hehe) */
00121 
00122         /* first step should be with none-demagnetization so its Intensity is NRM */
00123         if (project.getStep(0) != null) {
00124             Double mag = project.getValue(0, MeasurementValue.MAGNETIZATION);
00125             if (mag != null) {
00126                 double q = 25.13 * mag / project.getSusceptibility();
00127                 qValue.setText("" + (int) (q * 100) / 100.0);
00128             }
00129         }
00130         if (project.getVolume() != 0) {
00131             double d = project.getMass() / project.getVolume();
00132             density.setText("" + (int) (d * 100) / 100.0);
00133         }
00134         /* Sequence Table */
00135         sequenceTableModel = new PrintSequenceTableModel(project);
00136         sequenceTable.setModel(sequenceTableModel);
00137         sequenceTable.getTableHeader().setReorderingAllowed(false);
00138         sequenceTable.getTableHeader().setResizingAllowed(false);
00139         sequenceTable.setDefaultRenderer(StyledWrapper.class, new StyledTableCellRenderer());
00140         sequenceTable.setBorder(BorderFactory.createMatteBorder(sequenceTable.getIntercellSpacing().height,
00141                 sequenceTable.getIntercellSpacing().width, 0, 0, sequenceTable.getGridColor()));
00142         updateColumns();
00143 
00144         /* Plots */
00145         plot1 = new IntensityPlot();
00146         plot2 = new StereoPlot();
00147         plots.add(plot1);
00148         plots.add(plot2);
00149         plot1Panel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00150         plot2Panel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00151         plot3Panel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00152         plot4Panel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00153         plot1Panel.add(plot1, "Center");
00154         plot2Panel.add(plot2, "Center");
00155         //plot3Panel.add(plot3, "Center");
00156         //plot4Panel.add(plot4, "Center");
00157         plot1Panel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(200, 200));
00158         plot2Panel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(200, 200));
00159 
00160         for (Plot plot : plots) {
00161             plot.reset();
00162             if (project != null) {
00163                 for (int i = 0; i < project.getSteps(); i++) {
00164                     plot.add(project.getStep(i));
00165                 }
00166             }
00167         }
00168 
00169         /* Layout */
00170         setLayout(new BorderLayout());
00171         add(contentPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
00172         setMinimumSize(new Dimension(500, 700));
00173 
00174         /* White background */
00175         setOpaque(printedPanel, false);
00176         printedPanel.getParent().setBackground(Color.WHITE);
00177 
00178         /* Listeners */
00179         print.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
00180             public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00181                 closeDialog();
00182                 ComponentPrinter.printComponent(getPrintedDocument(), PrintPanel.this.project.getName());
00183             }
00184         });
00185         cancel.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
00186             public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00187                 closeDialog();
00188             }
00189         });
00190 
00191         // HACK: for some reason printing without preview does not work
00192         if (printDirectly) {
00193             SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
00194                 public void run() {
00195                     print.doClick();
00196                 }
00197             });
00198         }
00199     }
00200 
00204     private static void setOpaque(JComponent container, boolean opaque) {
00205         Queue<Component> components = new LinkedList<Component>();
00206         components.add(container);
00207         Component component = null;
00208         while ((component = components.poll()) != null) {
00209             if (component instanceof JComponent) {
00210                 ((JComponent) component).setOpaque(opaque);
00211             }
00212             if (component instanceof Container) {
00213                 for (Component c : ((Container) component).getComponents()) {
00214                     components.add(c);
00215                 }
00216             }
00217         }
00218     }
00219 
00225     public JPanel getPrintedDocument() {
00226         return printedPanel;
00227     }

00232     private void closeDialog() {
00233         if (creator != null) {
00234             creator.setVisible(false);
00235         }
00236     }
00237 
00241     private void updateColumns() {
00242         TableColumnModel columnModel = sequenceTable.getColumnModel();
00243         for (int col = 0; col < columnModel.getColumnCount(); col++) {
00244             // find out the column's preferred width using the actual cell contents
00245             int width = 20;
00246             Component comp;
00247             for (int row = 0; row < sequenceTable.getRowCount(); row++) {
00248                 comp = sequenceTable.getCellRenderer(row, col).getTableCellRendererComponent(sequenceTable,
00249                         sequenceTable.getValueAt(row, col), false, false, row, col);
00250                 width = Math.max(width, comp.getPreferredSize().width);
00251             }
00252             columnModel.getColumn(col).setPreferredWidth(width);
00253         }
00254     }

00453 
00459     private class PrintSequenceTableModel extends AbstractTableModel {
00460 
00461         private StyledWrapper wrapper = new StyledWrapper();
00462 
00463         private MeasurementSequenceTableModel model;
00464 
00465         public PrintSequenceTableModel(Project project) {
00466             model = new MeasurementSequenceTableModel();
00467             model.setProject(project);
00468             wrapper.horizontalAlignment = SwingConstants.TRAILING;
00469         }
00470 
00471         public int getRowCount() {
00472             if (model.getProject().isSequenceEditEnabled()) {
00473                 return model.getRowCount();         // do not show the last row (for adding steps)
00474             } else {
00475                 return model.getRowCount() + 1;     // the first row is for the header
00476             }
00477         }
00478 
00479         public int getColumnCount() {
00480             return model.getColumnCount();
00481         }
00482 
00483         @Override public Class<?> getColumnClass(int columnIndex) {
00484             return StyledWrapper.class;
00485         }
00486 
00487         public Object getValueAt(int rowIndex, int columnIndex) {
00488             if (rowIndex == 0) {
00489                 wrapper.value = model.getColumnName(columnIndex);
00490                 return wrapper;
00491             } else {
00492                 Object obj = model.getValueAt(rowIndex - 1, columnIndex);
00493                 if (obj instanceof StyledWrapper) {
00494                     StyledWrapper wrapper = (StyledWrapper) obj;
00495                     obj = wrapper.value;
00496                 }
00497                 wrapper.value = obj;
00498                 return wrapper;
00499             }
00500         }
00501     }
00502 }
